pageContext.claim: “Almost 90 percent of Venezuelans now live in poverty.”
pageContext.analysis: A consortium of Venezuelan universities found nearly 90 percent of Venezuelans were living in poverty in 2017, but the country hasn't released official numbers since 2015 and so there is no way to confirm this research. The study found 61.2 percent lived in extreme poverty, which differs from the World Data Lab's calculation, which draws on data from the United Nations, the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund, of 19.6 percent.
